naslov: OMIŠ - NEMIRA - EKSKLUZIVNA  - KUĆA - ZGRADA SA 9 ZASEBNIH APARTMANA (prodaja)

opis: NA PRODAJU  NOVA LUKSUZNA APARTMANSKA ZGRADA, 180 m OD MORA (NEMIRA, OMIŠ) 9 stanova sa 12 parking mjesta  - Visok povrat kroz turizam Udaljenost od mora: samo 180 metara OSNOVNE INFORMACIJE: Vrsta objekta: Novogradnja  etažirana stambena zgrada Površina parcele: 891 m² Ukupno stanova: 9 (svi legalni i etažirani) Ukupno parking mjesta: 12 (9 legalnih + 3 GRATIS  1 zatvorena garaža i 2 otvorena) Cijena:  1.600.000 € Turistički prihod: cca 70.000 € po sezoni Dokumentacija: Uporabna dozvola + energetski certifikat Vlasništvo: 1/1, bez tereta OPIS OBJEKTA: Prodaje se kompletno namještena i luksuzno uređena **apartmanska zgrada** idealna za turistički najam ili ulaganje u nekretnine. Zgrada je građena najmodernijim materijalima te ima vrhunsku zvučnu izolaciju. Sve četiri strane obložene su benkovačkim bijelim i tamnim kamenom, što objektu daje poseban šarm i trajnost. Stan 1: zaseban ulaz Stanovi 29: zajednički ulaz Svaki apartman sadrži: Klima uređaj Vlastiti sef za ključeve Moderne kupaonice i opremu Najkvalitetniju unutarnju i vanjsku PVC stolariju Internet priključak (poseban na svakom katu) Zgrada opremljena parlafonom VANJSKI SADRŽAJI I OKUĆNICA: 3 prostrane terase  (ukupno 50 m²) za grill s panoramskim pogledom na more 4 uređena vrta sa 30 stabala maslina 5 pomoćnih objekata (ukupno 50 m²) Vrtna kućica visoke kvalitete (10 m²) Zatvorena garaža s daljinskim upravljanjem + 2 dodatna otvorena parkirna mjesta GRATIS Ukupno 12 parkirnih mjesta  (vrijednost jednog u Nemiri: 25.000 €) DODATNI SADRŽAJI: 9 x klima uređaja 9 x kupaonica + 2 dodatna WC-a 2 vanjska tuša Praonica: 3 perilice rublja, 1 sušilica, 1 perilica suđa Pristup: izravno s glavne ceste i pješke s magistrale Osiguranje: svi stanovi i gosti osigurani kod Croatia Osiguranje PRAVNI STATUS I UPRAVLJANJE: Uredno vlasništvo, bez hipoteka ili kredita Novi vlasnik samo prebacuje kategorizaciju (nema dodatnih pravnih procedura) ODLIČNA INVESTICIJSKA PRILIKA Objekt generira stabilan prihod iz turističkog najma  spreman za rad bez dodatnih ulaganja! FOR SALE  NEW LUXURY APARTMENT BUILDING, JUST 180 M FROM THE SEA (NEMIRA, OMIŠ) 9 Apartments with 12 Parking Spaces  High Return on Tourism Investment Distance from the sea: Only 180 meters BASIC INFORMATION: Property type: Newly built  subdivided residential apartment building Plot size: 891 m² Total apartments: 9 (all legally registered and subdivided) Total parking spaces: 12 (9 legal + 3 FREE  1 closed garage + 2 open spaces) Price: €1,600,000 Tourism income potential: approx. €70,000 per season Documentation: Occupancy permit + Energy certificate Ownership: Clean title, 1/1, no encumbrances PROPERTY DESCRIPTION: Fully furnished and luxuriously equipped apartment building for sale, ideal for tourist rental or investment. The building is constructed using high-quality modern materials with excellent sound insulation. All four sides of the facade are cladded in white and dark Benkovac stone, giving the property a distinctive and lasting aesthetic. Apartment 1: Separate private entrance Apartments 29: Shared main entrance Each apartment includes: Air conditioning Private key lock box (safe) Modern bathrooms and high-end fittings Premium interior and exterior PVC joinery Dedicated internet access on each floor Intercom system (parlophone) installed EXTERIOR FEATURES AND GARDEN: 3 spacious grill terraces (total 50 m²) with panoramic sea views 4 landscaped gardens with 30 olive trees 5 auxiliary structures (total area: 50 m²) High-quality garden house (10 m²) Closed garage with remote control + 2 additional open parking spaces (FREE) Total of 12 parking spaces (value per space in Nemira: €25,000) ADDITIONAL AMENITIES: 9 x air conditioners 9 x bathrooms + 2 additional toilets 2 x outdoor showers Laundry room: 3 washing machines, 1 dryer, 1 dishwasher Easy access: directly from the main road and pedestrian access from the coastal highway All apartments and guests are insured through Croatia Osiguranje LEGAL STATUS & MANAGEMENT: Clean ownership, no mortgages or loans The new owner only needs to transfer the existing categorization permit (no legal delays) EXCELLENT INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY The building generates stable seasonal income and is ready for business without additional investment.
